model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Parent, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Child, I have a new project that I've been working on.
What is it, Parent?
I created a website where I post advertisements, and people can pay to see them.
Oh, that's interesting. How does it work?
Well, I create the ads myself, and then I post them on my website. People who want to view the ads can pay a small fee, and then they can see them.
Do you think people will pay to see your ads?
I don't know yet, but I hope so. I've put a lot of effort into creating some eye-catching ads.
That sounds cool, but why do you want to make money from ads?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Parenting and Adoption', 'Related Summaries': 'Parent expresses desire to adopt more children and provide a loving home.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Parent: Child, I wanted to talk to you about something important. ### Child: Sure, what is it? ### Parent: Now that I have adopted you, I want to adopt other children too. ### Child: That's great news! How many children do you want to adopt? ### Parent: I'm interested in adopting children who are younger than you, preferably between the ages of 2 and 5. ### Child: That's a good idea. They will get a second chance at having a loving family. ### Parent: Yes, that's what I am hoping for. I also want to adopt siblings, so that they can grow up together. ### Child: I think that's really important. I'm happy that we found each other, and I know that other children will be just as lucky to have you as their parent. ### Parent: Thank you, that means a lot to me. And I promise that I will always try to be the best parent I can be for all of my children.' }
```
